title: 1909 Obak Tennant and 1911 Dillon available...prices lowered on 11/24!!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: 1909 Obak Tennant and 1911 Dillon available...prices lowered on 11/24!!
posts.post_content:
Tennant is in VG+ condition with no wrinkling or wear and only minor touches to the corners.  Asking $85 delivered.  Dillon has a minor color pass shift that extends into the caption at the bottom of the card.  It also has an interesting sort of "diamond cut".  Dillon is in GD/VG condition with one tiny wrinkle on the right.  Asking $35....

Would do both cards for $100 if anyone wanted both....

Thanks in advance!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=285542&d=1503764773[/IMG]
Thanks Brian.  Do you mind posting a scan of the backs?

Hi Tim,

Not a problem....here you go!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=285671&d=1503856128[/IMG]
Lowering prices....down to $75 for Tennant and $30 for Dillon. Will do both for $95....thanks!!
